item.title: Critical Role Companions Feature In "A Familiar Find" Strategy Game From Darrington Press
item.content:encoded:
Darrington Press has announced a new board game set in the world of Exandria. The new board game, A Familiar Find, is all about the loyal animal companions going on an adventure on behalf of their summoner.

Critical Role's A Familiar Find Board Game Announcement

According to an official blog post on Darrington Press' website, A Familiar Find is a fast-paced strategic card game. In the game, players take on the roles of magical familiars charged with an important task by their arcane master. 

That task is to find rare magical ingredients across the land of Exandria. To that end, you will explore ever-shifting magical locations, seek and collect magical components, and try to stay one step ahead of rivals attempting to sabotage you. Those rivals will set traps, call your bluff, and attempt to ruin any strategies you implement. Thankfully, you can utilize your own wits and magical spells to vex them as well.

A Familiar Find is designed for up to four players. Each copy of the game contains a rulebook, over 84 Arcane Cards, 13 Location Cards which contain various game-changing effects, and ten playable familiars complete with their own unique character boards. The first player to either collect a full set of ingredients or three Astral Essence cards is declared the winner.

Critical Role fans may recognize a few of the playable options. They include Trinket, the armored bear from Campaign 1 and The Legend of Vox Machina, the Wildfire Spirit Monkey, Mister, and the reanimated rat Pate de Rolo are from Campaign 3.

Curiously, A Familiar Find doesn't feature any companions from Campaign 2. Sprinkle the Crimson Weasel and Nugget The Blink Dog, two of Jester's pets from The Mighty Nein, aren't mentioned. Chances are they may appear in an expansion, potentially to coincide with the release of Season 2 of the Prime Video animated series.

A Familiar Find will be available on April 7, 2026 and will be sold at an MSRP of $29.99.
